content: पराजयः {@--1@} Overpowering, conquest, conquering, subjugating, defeat; <ls>R. 11. 19</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 199.</ls> {@--2@} Being overcome by, not being able to suffer (with <ab>abl.</ab>); as in अध्ययनात्पराजयः {@--3@} Losing, loss, failure (as in a law-suit); अन्यथावादिनो (साक्षिणः) यस्य ध्रुवस्तस्य पराजयः <ls>Y. 2. 79.</ls> {@--4@} Deprivation. {@--5@} Desertion.
